Articles.Content: Well that was hard to fix attachmend nodes ( what a joke ) and have my own TAC Life support cfg's and might use some of the parts you didn't and let me guess you can't model and all you can do is maybe edit some cfg's ?
You are not forced to use it. So take some time to cool and fix the nodes yourself if you want!

lol already did.

EDIT- IMO modders mod 1 because they like doing it and 2 to sharpen there skills and alot share there work and hope others in joy it now when someone comes along and branches there mod then modder 1 isn't seeing the download numbers they like and think people don't like there work and they stop modding and so called modder 2 might not even know how to model and maybe just alittle cfg editing so now he or she thinks there a modder you tell me who's the loser ? Hint ( all of use )

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-09T21:15:19Z" title="05/09/2015 09:15  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 9, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**

Hi MeCripp

You are right, modders mod because they like it and i did 4 hours exacly that. I also learnd a few new things while i liked it :-). I had fun doing it and want to share it. How i share is my own choice. And if you would have taken a look you would have seen that the attachment nodes are not only fixed they are in new places wich took me quite a few tries to make it how i want it. How many people my stuff use is their choice, hell im happy for me not depended on download numbers for self-esteem (these times are way past me, luckily).

IMO: If they stop modding because the don't get like 1000 downloads or whatever then they mod for the wrong reasons. It should be fun doing it and shareing is a bonus. I'm long enough in the shareing of my stuff business to not depend on downloads. Hell one of my creations did only get download like 4 times in 7 years. But thats not whats driving me and noone should depend on that.

Nice looking pack, and with it being updated will give it a try.

Thanks for your work and the mod.

Will get back with feedback after testing.

cheers.
